sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng bǎ tōngzhī tiē zài qiáng shàng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez coller l'avis sur le mur.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please stick the notice on the wall.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我收到了大学的录取通知书。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ shōudào le dàxué de lùqǔ tōngzhīshū.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai reçu la lettre d'admission de l'université.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I received the university admission letter.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Rùkǒu zài nàbiān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'entrée est là-bas.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The entrance is over there.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Shìchǎng jìngzhēng yuèláiyuè jīliè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La concurrence sur le marché est de plus en plus féroce.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Market competition is becoming more and more fierce.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ zuìhǎo zǎodiǎn chūfā.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Tu ferais mieux de partir tôt.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You had better leave early.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们需要制定一个计划。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen xūyào zhìdìng yī gè jìhuà.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons établir un plan.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We need to make a plan.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这件衣服的图案很漂亮。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè jiàn yīfu de tú'àn hěn piàoliang.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le motif de ce vêtement est très joli.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The pattern on this clothing is very beautiful.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jīntiān wán de zhēn tòngkuài!
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: On s'est vraiment bien amusé aujourd'hui !
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We had a really great time today!

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā bǎ qiú tóu jìn le lánkuāng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a lancé le ballon dans le panier.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He threw the ball into the basket.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā quánshēnxīn tóurù gōngzuò.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il se consacre entièrement à son travail.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is fully devoted to his work.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ zài túzhōng yùdào le péngyou.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai rencontré un ami en chemin.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I met a friend on the way.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Suǒyǒu de xuésheng dōu lái le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Tous les étudiants sont venus.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: All the students came.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Huìyì tuīchí dào xià zhōu le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La réunion a été reportée à la semaine prochaine.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The meeting has been postponed to next week.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zài yínháng huàn le wàihuì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a échangé des devises à la banque.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He exchanged foreign currency at the bank.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 万一下雨，我们就不去了。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wànyī xiàyǔ, wǒmen jiù bú qù le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Au cas où il pleuvrait, nous n'irions pas.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: In case it rains, we won't go.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè dào cài de wèidao hěn hǎo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce plat a très bon goût.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This dish tastes very good.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ mǎi le yī shuāng xīn wàzi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai acheté une paire de nouvelles chaussettes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I bought a pair of new socks.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jìn wū qǐng tuō xié.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez enlever vos chaussures en entrant.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please take off your shoes when entering.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì yī gè zhēnzhèng de péngyou.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est un véritable ami.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is a true friend.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 女士们先生们，欢迎光临。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǚshìmen xiānshengmen, huānyíng guānglín.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Mesdames et messieurs, bienvenue.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Ladies and gentlemen, welcome.
